name: Oriri
description:
Oriri is a casual 2D mobile game inspired by the minigame "Sky Hop" from the mobile game "Pou". The game was made by students in the 4th Semester of the Game Design course at Anhembi Morumbi University.

In this game you must climb towards the sky through the green platforms, while avoiding the red platforms and trying to be as fast as possible to acquire the best possible score before the time runs out.
